word:
Satan's Substitution--Selfishness for Love. --Through disobedience man's powers were perverted, 

206 

and selfishness took the place of love. His nature became so weakened that it was impossible for him to resist the power of evil; and the tempter saw being fulfilled his purpose to thwart the divine plan of man's creation and fill the earth with misery and desolation.--CT 33 (1913).
